idDocumentDetailstitle: Enter the details exactly as they appear on the document
docNumberHint: This is a 9 characters long. It is usually shown in the top right hand corner of the photo page in the
chooseCountryhint: This is usually shown on the first page of the
biometricPassportHint: This is 9 characters long. It is usually shown in the top right hand corner of the photo page in the passport.
irishPassportHint: This is 9 characters long. It is usually shown on the front of the card in the top, right hand corner.
ukDriversLicenceHint: This is 16 characters long. For example, GIBBS911800DA529.
identityCardHint: This will have between 8 and 12 characters, depending on the country of issue.
biometricCardHint: This is 9 characters long. For example, ZU1234567.
passCardHint: This needs to be a unique reference or number that is shown on the document.
ukForceCardHint: This needs to be a unique reference or number that is shown on the document.
ukArmedForceCardHint: This will have between 6 and 8 characters.
photoWorkPermitHint: This needs to be a unique reference or number that is shown on the document.
photoVisaHint: This will have between 8 and 9 characters.
ukFirearmsLicenceHint: This will have between 6 and 10 characters.
photoIdPradoDetailsHint: This needs to be a unique reference or number that is shown on the document.
error-docNumberInput: Enter the details for the {doc selected}
error-docNumberLength: {doc selected} must be 50 characters or fewer
error-docNumberFormat: {doc selected} must only include letters a to z, numbers and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-noExpiryDate: Enter the expiry date for {doc selected}
error-noExpiryDayMonth: {doc selected} must include a day and a month
error-noExpiryDayYear: {doc selected} must include a day and a year
error-noExpiryMonthYear: {doc selected} must include a month and a year
error-expiryDateInvalid: {doc selected} expiry date must be a real date
error-dateAfterIdChecksDone: Expiry date for {doc selected} must be after {id checks completed} when you completed the identity checks
error-UK_biometric_residence_permit: Expiry date for {doc selected} must be not more than 18 months earlier {id checks completed} when you completed the identity checks
